title: Lesson 14
paragraph: Events and culture enrich communities through participation and evaluation. Attending festivals, relying on chapters and channels of communication, and ensuring contented experiences make social life meaningful.

words.meaning: a celebration or event, often cultural or religious
words.example: The city hosts a music festival every summer.

words.meaning: to be present at an event
words.example: She attended the conference last week.

words.meaning: to judge the value or quality of something
words.example: The teacher evaluated the students' projects.
He was in constant communication with the team.

words.meaning: to go from one place to another
words.example: They traveled across Europe last summer.

words.meaning: a division of a book or a part of an organization
words.example: She read the first chapter of the book.

words.meaning: a medium for communication or distribution
words.example: They used multiple channels to broadcast the message.
He felt contented with his achievements.

words.meaning: able to be understood quickly at a glance
words.example: The infographic is glanceable for busy readers.
She relies on her friends for support.
